caption: Service was amazing and the food was incredible. Lovely experience at Soju! Get the beef and spicy pork!

Great place.

Our favorite thing was for sure the popcorn chicken and the bulgogi meat. I'm sure everything on the menu is great. This was the best service we've ever received anywhere in Wynwood, so definitely come try it! They also had these cool …

After living in Seoul for a few months pre- Covid, I was missing The flavors of South Korea, especially Kimchi! I have taken several friends to this restaurant now just to get my fix of korea flavors and everyone of them tells me how much …
Great service and the best chef around.

I love this spot! They prepare marvelous dishes, their menu is large, The chief cook in that restaurant is a specialist, I enjoy very much tasting all their dishes. The food is always of high qualtity, the attitude towards the guests  is nice. I  go often to this place and I was never discontended. I recommend it with no hesitation.

We ordered the Bulgogi and short ribs as our meats and everything was so tasty! The meats were marinated perfectly and the sauces were great compliments to the rice and meats. Everything was so easy to cook ourselves and done in less than …
(Translated by Google) Korean BBQ, very good!  (Original) BBQ Koreano, muy bueno!
Awesome food, awesome service, I HIGHLY recommend this place !!! You won’t be disappointed!

Soju was a great experience! Outdoor seating was small yet comfortable! The ambiance was really pleasant outdoors while grilling on the charcoal grill.  The customer service was FANTASTIC!! Was greeted with a smile and the waitress and …

We ate here 2 weeks ago while on vacation to Miami Beach. While the food quality and flavor was good, the portion size was incredibly small. We ordered 1 serving of beef brisket and 1 serving of kalbi (Korean short ribs). The brisket was …

Wow. Very cool. The ambiance of the outdoor seating area definitely made me feel like I was at an old school bbq restaurant in South Korea. They even have a variety of Korean drinks and alcohol. Although the quality of food was not …
Delicious Korean food for a very reasonable price
Delicious but quite expensive than the others.
Cute and welcoming garden, staff very helpful and kind, delicious food at a very affordable price! Tried almost everything they suggested us... yes, very recommended!
super good food!
This place is awesome, the staff are super friendly. Since the moment I entered and left it was a great atmosphere, the Korean Wings are to die for, I recommend this place 100%!
We were so satisfied with their food and service. I will surely recommend your Restaurant to all of my family and friends here in our area! Thanks a lot!

Worst experience, The price is absurd. I'm saying the price for the quality.(of course, i understand the downtown prices) Moreover, it's the first Korean restaurant to set the price of the first side dish as far as I know.  Hidden price,, …
So much fun to have the Korean BBQ. Seasoning was different than we're used to. With soju makes it all the better.

Great service - really nice and helpful staff, lovely atmosphere and music, and mostly importantly delicious and fresh food. They also have a great selection of Korean drinks. Great spot, one of my favorites!
Excellent Korean BBQ with charcoal and service. A little pricey for the portion size.
Great service great experience. So happy to have Korean bbq in Miami. Really awesome!
Good korean BBQ. Good service. The charcoal is the key. + There is a promotion on Yelp.
My husband and I loved the experience at SOJU. We did our best to socially distance but the spacing is pretty tight. The staff was courteous and the food was delish!
Love this place.
Foods great. Atmosphere is good. Servers were nice and helpful....but it was really over priced.
Great food! Great service!
Delishhh!! & intimate & friendly environment!!

We love to go out. Yesterday we went to this magnificent restaurant which we didn’t know before. We passed a lovely evening there with delicious food and an efficient team and  a professional cook. We  added this venue in our phone list  and we shall no doubt go again soon. We warmly recommend.
Food was good but not great lunch box was rice and bulgogi(beef) was way over price for me coming from korea, but I guess it the norm for downtown miami.
Amazing food and atmosphere!

This place is the one I like best. I go to plenty of restaurants but here I go the most. The team is very welcoming and the cooking they offer is so delicious. I would always prefer to have a nice meal in this place. Highly recommended.
The staff were great. But the food was horrible and the price was insanely unreasonable. Terrible. Never come back. If you’re an Asian, do not come there.

korean bbq, yummy. Visited near twelve, it was not full.
The place offers an awesome variety of delicious food. I like eating here. Employees are always nice, prices are reasonable and the spot is always neat.

We got the rice bowl with bulgogi beef and it was amazing. Serving size was great and the sauce they put in it is amazing. On a whim we ordered the chicken wings and all I can say is WOW. They came out fresh out of the fryer and were cooked …
👏👏👏 I will never forget these flavors. And the service team is fantastic. I recommend the combo. Perfect spot for a double date.
korean bbq, yeah, so tasty. i'll return with my friends. menu is similar to a restaurant in jacksonville i liked.
My daughter and I had a great time. The food was delicious. Best pork I have ever tasted. I can't wait to go back again.
as good as it looks online. the food is unpretentious, delicious, and priced well. the bulgogi toast and popcorn chicken are absolutely order again items for us. 9/10 will absolutely return.
Very tasty Korean bbq, great service!
Super good Korean BBQ!!! All terrace were sanitized!, so a peace of mind these days!!

Soju is an exceptional restaurant. The staff is stellar and the service extraordinary. Their attention to detail, service, cleanliness, and conscientious care - especially during this time - for customer service is A+. The food is fresh, …

The food was great and it was a very cool experience. We were two and got the pork belly and short ribs for the grill, they come with rice, lettuce and sesame leaves for wrapping, radish and kimchi. It was a good amount of food and everything was delicious!

Visited here with 2 friends and we had a blast! The place is somewhat hidden in the Wynwood area but that did not stop them from providing an amazing service and even better food. One of the managers taught us how to mix beer and a shot of …

The food was soooo good! First time having Korean BBQ in Miami like this. Staff were really sweet and nice. The space was definitely very cute if you wanted to take some Instagram photos. You should definitely check it out! Especially if you never had Korean BBQ. Be sure to ask how to cook and eat it so you get the full experience.

For someone who had Korean food probably more than 100 times outside of Korea and much more than that in Korea - this is THE place! Perfectly authentic experience, absolutely amazing and delicious, and service is top notch!

Delicious food, the portions are great for a group - we shared a combo 2 with 4 people. The radish is to die for & they have some of the best kimchi I’ve had. There’s not as many vegetable sides as traditional bbq calls for but the sides …
Felt like being back in Korea. Music was on point, soju was great, staff was attentive. Love Cass beer too. Thanks

We got the pork rice bowl to go and it was A+. Good portion size (packed in pretty tight the bowl size is deceptive) with some veggies and japchae. The marinade is perfect - not too sweet - and meat was tender. Tastes just like my mom's! If …
Amazing place. Service was great and food A+++ So happy to have a great KBBQ place so close to home. They have many flavors of soju and their cocktails were super smooth. Highly recommend!
The cocktails were sooooo good and the food went so well with the drinks ☺️🥂. I'll be coming back!
Best service I’ve ever had during a meal. Amazing food as well. I absolutely loved coming here and I definitely will be back! It was such a vibe. Everyone should try this place :)
Amazing prices and food and where else are you going to find KBBQ?!

The food was incredible. I recommend the combo! I would give 5 stars if the seating was more comfortable, the super short round stools are tough for tall people and we were stuck in the corner with the greenery poking our backs.
Absolutely delicious, super flavorful!

I go with my wife to this lovely spot quite a bit! This is my favorite spot to dine.  I go there many times. The food is very tasty, the crew is helpful and the cost is good. I like eating in this spot for a tasty meal.

So so good! Came here on a Saturday date night, and the place was buzzing. I was immediately pleased by the festive outdoor space. We ordered bulgogi beef, chicken and brisket which came with veggies and rice and then an egg soufflé. All of …

I love this restaurant! They provide high class meals, their menu is decent, The chef in that place is very trained, I like very much trying all their dishes. The dishes are consistently good, the attitude towards the customers  is good. I frequently visit this place and I not even once was disappointed. I recommend this place.
It's fun! Watch your food get cooked.. it's not crazy like benihana much more intimate and interesting flavors when roll up with sauce and salty mix in lettuce.
Best Korean bbq I’ve had in the south. Fantastic service and love the atmosphere. Definitely coming back with a group. Love this place!!
Best Korean restaurant in the town and the best service from Renata  💕🙏🏻
Love this concept!!! Amazing food and service. If you are looking for something fun and creative this is your place. You most try the pasión fruit Korean drink is delicious 😋
ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS a must try in wynwood ! You won’t be disappointed.

Friendly and outgoing staff, fantastic customer service but definitely a work in progress still.  We were definitely disappointed in the quality per price point at least for the $28 kalbi  - it was a bit tough and tasted more like Korean …

This place had really delicious food. It was our first time having Korean BBQ and it did not disappoint. The Spicy Pork was incredible!! Our waitress Reinata (sorry if i spelled it wrong) was very lovely. She was very attentive and even …

I am a big fan of Korean cuisine. The food at Soju was was authentic and delicious and the decor and vibe was really nice.  I was there for the first time with my sister and cannot wait to go back for a dinner date with my husband and even with a larger group of friends.
fantastic place, fantastic food, fantastic atmosphere, I was one of the lucky first to try this new place, very recommendable, awesome food!!!
Stopped by and had some some spicy pork bulgagi rice. Absolutely delicious! Accompanied it with some Soju, definitely hit the spot.

We came here on a whim as we have been looking for good Korean BBQ in Miami. We were NOT disappointed! The food was delicious and the service was excellent. The price was more than reasonable. Come here on a date or with a group, you won't be let down.

Amazing place. Dont think about it, just go in.
Do you know price?
Great food, great cozy eating area and modern atmosphere. Very friendly staff.

Great place, the food was delicious, great atmosphere with a charming garden and the service was exceptional. I ordered the beef rice bowl and the meat was to die for. My husband had their k-pop monster burger and he loved it too.
Great place, cozy with delicious food, excellent music and great drinks. Love the relax ambiance and location.

We had a great family dinner with the kids last night at Soju Miami. They have amazing authentic Korean barbecue, rice noodles, and rice bowls. The Korean style sticky chicken wings are a must have. Also, the K-POP monster burger is super …

Clean meat, real Korean BBQ style and chef’s. Loved the foods and the atmosphere!! Their bowls are deliciousssssss. A must to try their sandwiches well... and not to forget to mention- we were their for happy hour with my colleagues and we had a great time, all loved their Dodd and drinks.
Great food and really friendly staff!
Friendly waiters and delicious food. Highly recommend.
What a nice place. I had so much fun and highly recommended
Delicious food & love the environment. Service was great. Went out with a large party and everything went perfectly! Will definitely come back soon!
The best Korean barbecue in miami, great drinks and fun ambiance. The service was excellent and we enjoy it every time.
